BLACKMARK! item.title: An error
item.dc:creator: @helbringer22 helbringer22
item.description:
@helbringer22 wrote:

i have about 38 errors, after tyring to make my own tut on my server, and i found that evry error is an “illegal start of expression” ill give an example.

client.java:10632: illegal start of expression public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { ^ client.java:12554: illegal start of expression public void deleteObject(int objectX, int objectY) ^ client.java:12566: illegal start of expression public boolean inwildy2 = false; ^ client.java:12567: illegal start of expression public void checkwildy() ^ client.java:12590: illegal start of expression public int packetSize = 0, packetType = -1; ^ client.java:12591: illegal start of expression public int smitimer = 300; ^ client.java:12592: illegal start of expression public boolean s1 = false; ^ client.java:12593: illegal start of expression public boolean s2 = false; ^ client.java:12595: illegal start of expression public static int getprize[] = {1,2}; ^ client.java:12597: illegal start of expression public static int getprizes() ^ client.java:12604: illegal start of expression public static int randomWeather() ^ client.java:12687: illegal start of expression public int sbtimer = 0; ^ client.java:12688: illegal start of expression public int sb = 0; ^ client.java:12689: illegal start of expression public boolean sbloop = false; ^ client.java:12690: illegal start of expression public boolean sbscan = false; ^ client.java:12692: illegal start of expression public boolean travelboat1 = false; ^ client.java:12693: illegal start of expression public boolean travelboat2 = false; ^ client.java:12694: illegal start of expression public int traveltime = 0; ^ client.java:12696: illegal start of expression public int attempts = 0; ^ client.java:12698: illegal start of expression public boolean teleport = false; ^ client.java:12699: illegal start of expression public int teletimer = 0; ^ client.java:12700: illegal start of expression public int teleX = 0; ^ client.java:12701: illegal start of expression public int teleY = 0; ^ client.java:12702: illegal start of expression public int newheightLevel = 0; ^ client.java:12704: illegal start of expression public void teleport() ^ client.java:12721: illegal start of expression public int eY = 0; ^ client.java:12722: illegal start of expression public int etimer = 0; ^ client.java:12723: illegal start of expression public int Warnlvl = 0; ^ client.java:12724: illegal start of expression public int kitstarter = 0; ^ client.java:12725: illegal start of expression public int blackmark = 0; ^ client.java:12726: illegal start of expression public boolean process() { ^ client.java:21397: illegal start of expression public int EssenceMineX[] = {2893,2921,2911,2926,2899}; ^ client.java:21398: illegal start of expression public int EssenceMineY[] = {4846,4846,4832,4817,4817}; ^ client.java:21406: illegal start of expression public int EssenceMineRX[] = {3253,3105,2681,2591}; ^ client.java:21407: illegal start of expression public int EssenceMineRY[] = {3401,9571,3325,3086}; ^ client.java:21414: illegal start of expression public boolean stairs(int stairs, int teleX, int teleY) { ^ client.java:24128: illegal start of expression public int Publicchat = 0; ^ client.java:24130: illegal start of expression public void pmstatus(int status) { //status: loading = 0 connecting = 1 fine = 2 ^ 38 errors Starting HellScape on 0.0.0.0:43594 People may now play!

what should i put infront of the public boolean, ints, and voids?
